attributes.action: urge Brian Ashton to select Josh Lewsey for the next England game.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: England's rugby team have now turned in two poor second half performances. We note that Josh Lewsey turned Wasps' game against Bath with a great second half.We don't know why he's been excluded from Ashton's team so far, but surely now is the time for the Government to help restore England's pride. First step? BRING BACK JOSH!!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
